Tender Title: Housing and Support for Families with Children on the Edge of Care
Tender Description: To provide support and hosting (overnight respite care) to families with children identified by North Tyneside Council as on the edge of (or trajectory towards) care in order to safely reduce the number of children and young people entering care, reducing the overall costs to the Council of placements.More details can be found on the NEPO Portal under North Tyneside Opportunities.
